note: This data aims to provide estimates that are comparable over time within individual countries. A [separate dataset](https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/share-of-population-in-multidimensional-poverty-urban-vs-rural-cme) provides more complete data to be used for comparisons across countries at a point in time.
title: Share of population in multidimensional poverty: Urban vs. rural
subtitle: Multidimensional poverty is defined as being deprived in a range of health, education and living standards indicators.
